entries.title: All Def Comedy
entries.synopsis: He launched a host of today’s comedy superstars in the ‘90s on the HBO series Russell Simmons’ Def Comedy Jam. Now, Russell Simmons returns to the network for All Def Comedy.

entries.title: Amy Schumer: Live from the Apollo
entries.synopsis: With her unique blend of honesty and unapologetic humor, Amy Schumer is one of the funniest, freshest faces in the industry today.

entries.title: Billy Crystal 700 Sundays
entries.synopsis: Billy Crystal brings his award-winning, one-man Broadway show to HBO in this deeply personal special.

entries.title: George Lopez: It's Not Me, It's You
entries.synopsis: Comedy superstar George Lopez performs live in front of a packed house at the Nokia Theatre in L.A. in this stand-up special.

entries.title: Jerrod Carmichael: 8
entries.synopsis: Taped in December 2016 before a live audience at the historic Masonic Hall in New York City, the show features Jerrod Carmichael's subversive, thought-provoking take on cultural norms.

entries.title: Jerrod Carmichael: Love at the Store
entries.synopsis: Rising comedy star Jerrod Carmichael takes to the stage of The Comedy Store in Hollywood, CA for his first HBO stand-up special.

entries.title: John Leguizamo's Ghetto Klown
entries.synopsis: John Leguizamo stars in this unabashed, uninhibited one-man performance based on his award-winning 2011 Broadway show.

entries.title: Katt Williams: Priceless
entries.synopsis: Hilariously high-energy comedian/rapper/actor Katt Williams returns to HBO for this stand-up comedy special directed by Spike Lee.

entries.title: Pete Holmes: Faces and Sounds
entries.synopsis: In this one-hour stand-up comedy special, taped before a live audience at the Vic Theatre in Chicago, Pete Holmes brings his unique brand of happy-go-lucky comedy to HBO, sharing hilarious and relatable insights on a number of subjects, including: the concept of sleep and nightmares; unexpected moments of comedy while traveling; quirks of the English language; how Brits deal with awkward situations; why he wears a specific T-shirt while flying; the fundamentally weird aspects of sex, porn and strip clubs; and more.

entries.title: Robert Klein: Unfair & Unbalanced
entries.synopsis: Robert Klein's ninth HBO stand-up special features an hour of hilarious insights plus a few memorable musical interludes.

entries.title: Sarah Silverman: We Are Miracles
entries.synopsis: Sharp-witted Sarah Silverman performs in front of an intimate audience of just 39 fans at L.A.’s Largo nightclub, taking aim at such subjects as cell-phone porn, crazy religions, specialty deodorants, terrible roommates, eyebrow waxing, her 19-year-old dog, and the miracle of existence.

entries.title: Tig Notaro: Boyish Girl Interrupted
entries.synopsis: Tig Notaro: Boyish Girl Interrupted features the Grammy nominee in her first-ever HBO stand-up comedy special. Known for her distinctive storytelling and offbeat sense of humor, Notaro often draws on her highly personal experiences with no-holds-barred honesty.

entries.title: T.J. Miller: Meticulously Ridiculous
entries.synopsis: Comedian and actor T.J. Miller takes to the stage to showcase his irreverent humor and voice his offbeat take on such topics as the differences between marijuana and alcohol, nightmares and his approach to mortality.

entries.title: Tracy Morgan: Black and Blue
entries.synopsis: Tracy Morgan delivers his hilarious takes on race relations, politics, celebrity, flying and more in this stand-up special.

entries.title: Wanda Sykes: I'ma Be Me
entries.synopsis: Emmy(R)-winning actress/comic Wanda Sykes returns to HBO for her second full-length stand-up special.

entries.title: Whitney Cummings: I'm Your Girlfriend
entries.synopsis: Whitney Cumming’s first HBO special, I’m Your Girlfriend features brutally honest, laser-sharp observations on modern gender dynamics, as she skewers the paradoxes of sex and relationships in an age when women have more power and independence than ever.

entries.title: Bob Saget: That Ain't Right
entries.synopsis: Former TV dad Bob Saget shows his truly twisted side in this one-hour, adults-only stand-up special.

entries.title: Cedric the Entertainer: Taking You Higher
entries.synopsis: Cedric the Entertainer—one of the 'Original Kings of Comedy'—seizes the spotlight in his first HBO stand-up comedy special.

entries.title: Chris Gethard: Career Suicide
entries.synopsis: An adaption of his one-man off-Broadway show of the same name, Chris Gethard: Career Suicide is a comedy about depression, alcoholism, suicide and the other funniest parts of life. Gethard holds nothing back as he dives into his experiences with mental illness and psychiatry, finding hope in the strangest places.

entries.title: Chris Rock: Bigger & Blacker
entries.synopsis: Chris Rock combines his hilarious delivery and his fearless style to launch an all-out comedy assault in his third solo HBO special.

entries.title: Chris Rock: Kill the Messenger
entries.synopsis: Chris Rock's fifth HBO comedy special features footage of the comic from performances in South Africa, New York and London.

entries.title: Chris Rock: Never Scared
entries.synopsis: Chris Rock performs stand-up from his 'Black Ambition Tour' in this comedy special taped before a live audience in Washington, D.C.

entries.title: D.L. Hughley: Going Home
entries.synopsis: Comedian D.L. Hughley hits the stage for this show that is full of sidesplitting material, including his insights on family and fatherhood.

entries.title: D.L. Hughley: Unapologetic
entries.synopsis: Popular stand-up comic D.L. Hughley takes the stage in Washington, D.C., in his fourth HBO special.

entries.title: Dana Carvey: Squatting Monkeys Tell No Lies
entries.synopsis: Emmy(R)-winning comedian Dana Carvey brings his riotous impressions, perceptions and impersonations to this one-hour stand-up special.

entries.title: Dane Cook Vicious Circle
entries.synopsis: Superstar comic Dane Cook comes home to Boston to perform in his first-ever solo HBO concert.

entries.title: Dave Attell: Captain Miserable
entries.synopsis: Dave Attell takes the stage for an adults-only stand-up show in which he dissects his most recent phobias, failures and fantasies.

entries.title: Dave Chappelle: Killin’ Them Softly
entries.synopsis: Comedian/actor/writer Dave Chappelle performs a hilarious stand-up routine at the Lincoln Theater in his hometown of Washington, D.C.

entries.title: David Brenner: Back With a Vengeance
entries.synopsis: The veteran stand-up star performs at the Venetian Resort Hotel Casino in Las Vegas in his fourth HBO special.

entries.title: David Cross: The Pride is Back
entries.synopsis: Stand-up special with David Cross, the co-star of HBO's cult comedy series 'Mr. Show With Bob and David.'

entries.title: David Spade: Take the Hit
entries.synopsis: Acerbic actor/comedian David Spade performs a riotous stand-up set in his first solo TV special.

entries.title: Dennis Miller: All In
entries.synopsis: Dennis Miller takes aim at the foibles and follies of society, politics, celebrity and more in his seventh solo HBO comedy special.

entries.title: Dennis Miller: The Raw Feed
entries.synopsis: Dennis Miller's sixth solo HBO comedy special is a riotous stand-up performance taped in front of a packed house at Chicago's Vic Theatre.

entries.title: Ellen DeGeneres: Here and Now
entries.synopsis: Comedian/actress Ellen DeGeneres brings her honesty and off-the-wall wit to this stand-up special taped live at NYC's Beacon Theater.

entries.title: Ellen DeGeneres: The Beginning
entries.synopsis: The sassy actress/comedian's third solo HBO special features material taped at New York City's Beacon Theater.

entries.title: Entre Nos, Part 1
entries.synopsis: Top Latino comedians Liss Pereira and Monica Escobedo perform no-holds-barred stand-up in this special hosted by Alex Marin y Kall.

entries.title: Ferrell Takes the Field
entries.synopsis: Will Ferrell travels to five different spring-training ballparks, playing 10 positions on 10 different teams, to fight cancer.

entries.title: George Lopez: America’s Mexican
entries.synopsis: Expect the unexpected when America's favorite Latino comic, George Lopez, hits the stage in his first HBO solo stand-up special.

entries.title: George Lopez: Tall, Dark & Chicano
entries.synopsis: George Lopez steps in front of a packed crowd at the AT&T Center in San Antonio, TX for this stand-up special.

entries.title: George Lopez: The Wall, Live from Washington, D.C.
entries.synopsis: George Lopez performs at the Concert Hall at the Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts in Washington, D.C.

entries.title: Jim Jefferies: I Swear to God
entries.synopsis: Rude, crude and lewd comic Jim Jefferies brings his unique brand of anecdotal humor to this stand-up special.

entries.title: Jim Norton: Monster Rain
entries.synopsis: 'Cringe comedy' king Jim Norton takes the stage at the Lincoln Theatre in Washington, D.C. for an hour of raucous, adults-only stand up.

entries.title: Lewis Black: Black on Broadway
entries.synopsis: Cantankerous comic Lewis Black stars in his first HBO stand-up special taped live at the Brooks Atkinson Theater in New York City.

entries.title: Lewis Black: Red, White & Screwed
entries.synopsis: Lewis Black delivers his comical insights into everything from the State of the Union to Dick Cheney's aim in this stand-up special.

entries.title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
entries.synopsis: It's Martin Lawrence as you've never seen him before—even tackling his own rambunctious personal life--in this stand-up concert.

entries.title: Richard Jeni: A Big Steaming Pile of Me
entries.synopsis: Award-winning comedian Richard Jeni delivers an hour of off-the-wall characterizations and humor in this stand-up comedy special.

entries.title: Robert Klein: The Amorous Busboy of Decatur Avenue
entries.synopsis: Robert Klein's eighth HBO comedy special features his witty insights into such disparate topics as current and past presidents and aging.

entries.title: Night of Too Many Stars
entries.synopsis: Get ready for a night of laughs when Jon Stewart hosts Night of Too Many Stars: America Unites for Autism Programs. A live show benefiting NEXT for Autism, the special will feature stand-up performances, sketches and short films.

entries.title: Rosie O’Donnell: A Heartfelt Stand Up
entries.synopsis: Rosie O'Donnell speaks straight from the heart (literally) in this stand-up special that details her life-changing heart attack; and more.

entries.title: The Pee-wee Herman Show on Broadway
entries.synopsis: Pee-wee brings Puppetland to Broadway—and the Playhouse to life—in this all-ages adaptation of the sensational stage show.

entries.title: Tracey Ullman in The Trailer Tales
entries.synopsis: Tracey Ullman's comedy special features the one-and-only 'Ruby Romaine'—the memorable character from HBO's 'Tracey Takes On.'

entries.title: Tracey Ullman: Live & Exposed
entries.synopsis: Tracey Ullman takes to the stage to explore the twists, turns and triumphs that have shaped her remarkable life and career.

entries.title: Will Ferrell: You’re Welcome America. A Final Night with George W Bush
entries.synopsis: Will Ferrell portrays outgoing 43rd President George W Bush in this special performance of his heralded one-man Broadway show.

entries.title: Felipe Esparza: Translate This
entries.synopsis: Comedian Felipe Esparza stars in his first HBO comedy special, featuring his unconventional riffs on the immigrant experience and life's everyday battles.

entries.title: Lady Day at Emerson's Bar and Grill
entries.synopsis: Tony Award-winner Audra McDonald plays Billie Holiday in this adaptation of the hit Broadway play.

entries.title: 2 Dope Queens
entries.synopsis: Jon Stewart joins the Queens to share early memories of living in New York, and Phoebe and Jessica test Jon's pizza knowledge.

entries.title: Tour de Pharmacy
entries.synopsis: From the team behind 7 Days in Hell comes this star-studded sports mockumentary about a dark, fictitious time, when cycling history was tainted by a hornet's nest of moral depravity and doping.

entries.title: The Leisure Class
entries.synopsis: A charming English con man's scheme to marry a wealthy socialite comes unraveled with the arrival of his wild and unpredictable brother.

entries.title: 7 Days in Hell
entries.synopsis: Golden Globe-winner Andy Samberg (Brooklyn Nine-Nine) and Game of Thrones star Kit Harington head up the cast of this mockumentary about an epic battle for epicness: the longest and greatest tennis match of all time.

entries.title: Bill Maher: Live from D.C.
entries.synopsis: The no-nonsense host of 'Real Time with Bill Maher' performs in his 10th solo stand-up special for HBO.

entries.title: Bill Maher: The Decider
entries.synopsis: Comedian, writer and HBO talk-show host Bill Maher performs a hilariously scathing stand-up set in this comedy special.

entries.title: Bill Maher: Victory Begins at Home
entries.synopsis: Comedian/writer/actor Bill Maher performs in this stand-up comedy special recorded at the Hudson Theatre in New York City.

entries.title: Bill Maher...But I'm Not Wrong
entries.synopsis: Bill Maher provides his hilarious insights and opinions on a variety of social and political issues in this stand-up special.

entries.title: Michelle Wolf: Nice Lady
entries.synopsis: ​Comedian Michelle Wolf  stars in her first HBO special — an hour of stand-up featuring her observations on feminism, dating, and other social issues.

entries.title: One Night Stand: Flight of the Conchords
entries.synopsis: The New Zealand folk-parody duo Flight of the Conchords perform their hilarious act in this comedy special.
